main event: A white object was observed hanging in the sky before disappearing in Twenty-Nine Palms, California on May 6, 1955.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be approximately three feet in diameter., It appeared at a five-degree elevation off the horizon., The duration of the sighting was several seconds., The sighting was considered probably a balloon, but there were no definitive conclusions., The report mentioned unusual aerial activity in the area.
